name: lime production, milled, packed | lime, packed | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18110/documentation

This dataset represents the packing of 1 kg of milled lime. This activity was created as a copy of the corresponding activity for Switzerland. Production volume and uncertainties have been adjusted accordingly. Comment from the original dataset (for Switzerland): The dataset is based on the module 'packing, lime products'.;Water flows were removed for v3.5 as they are included in supplying activity 'lime production, milled, loose'.

Packing process starting from milled lime, unpacked.

The activity ends with the product packed at the factory. The dataset includes the packing and the heating energy requirements for packing production and administration.
category: B:Mining and quarrying/08:Other mining and quarrying/081:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay/0810:Quarrying of stone, sand and clay

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Comment from the original dataset (for Switzerland): Data is based on a Swiss company.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Comment from the original dataset (for Switzerland): Data corresponds to the current Swiss technology.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: This activity was created as a copy of the corresponding activity for Switzerland, which was based on data for one Swiss company. Production volume and uncertainties have been adjusted accordingly.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Comment from the original dataset (for Switzerland): Data is from only one company in Switzerland (KFN).

exchanges.description: Comment from the original dataset (for Switzerland): Estimation, based on personal communication. Data corresponds to the Swiss company KFN for the year 2001.
